blog.name: shinsomnia-1
blog.title: Quirk, Angst
blog.description:
That dangonronpa

★BNHA Manga spoilers ★

summary:
Sad Kirishima 
———
How could he be a hero if he just stood by and watched.
Sure, he was training to be one, and sure he already...
body:
Sad Kirishima

———

How could he be a hero if he just stood by and watched.

Sure, he was training to be one, and sure he already had is provisional license.

But what did he do when he saw his classmates being bullied in middle school? He stood by and watched.

He did the same thing when some of his female classmates where being attacked.

He was a terrible hero and he knew it. He was a pathetic hero and he knew it. He wasn’t manly like he said, he wasn’t confident like he acted. He was an empty shell of who he used to be.

So why not let the world know, huh?

He hadn’t come out of his room for a day. People noticed, his classmates came up to his dorm room.

Knock knock

‘Oh? Was that his classmates at his door’ Kirishima thought.

Kirishima sighed, standing up and walking to his door, creaking it open slightly, “Yes?” He’d said.

His classmates showed faces of concern, kaminari was the first to speak up, “Kiribro? You okay?”

No, I am not okay. Kirishima thought.

He nodded and smiled, “Yeah I am! Just tired and I’ve been sleeping all day. Sorry for worrying you!”

And with that, everyone left.

Leaving Kirishima to his unheroic, pathetic self.

blog.name: shinsomnia-1
blog.title: Quirk, Angst
blog.description:
That dangonronpa

★BNHA Manga spoilers ★

summary:
Traitor Kaminari Fic
——
I found out.
I found out who the traitor is.
It was an accident, and how I wish I didn’t find...
body:
Traitor Kaminari Fic

——

I found out.

I found out who the traitor is.

It was an accident, and how I wish I didn’t find out.

—————

Kirishima was just curious, he didn’t want to be the one to find out who the traitor was, because he knew he’d break with that information, he was so close with everyone in the class.

Oh but it broke him even more knowing who it was.

Kaminari, the boy who almost always had a cheeky smirk on his face. Kaminari, the boy with golden eyes which screamed mischief.

Kaminari, the boy who stood in front of him now, a frown etched onto his face.

“I didn’t want you to find out..”

Oh, Kirishima didn’t want to find out either.

blog.name: shinsomnia-1
blog.title: Quirk, Angst
blog.description:
That dangonronpa

★BNHA Manga spoilers ★

summary:
Warning: Suicide, mentions of bad home situations, depression and death.
————————————————————
It’s been a year and a half since...
body:
Warning: Suicide, mentions of bad home situations, depression and death.

————————————————————

It’s been a year and a half since shinsou left.

Kaminari was still thinking about it.

He still went to his tombstone at the least, once a week. While all the other people Shinsou knew only went 1-2 every 3 months. Hell, some even stopped going.

Kaminari was never the smartest, sure. But he should have noticed the signs starting up again. When they were in U.A and found out about Shinsous bad habits. When they found out his terrible home life and got him out of it. He started turning into a healthier, happier person.

If he figured that out why couldn’t he figure out that he was starting the bad habits again.

His eye bags worsened, he told them it was because he had to stay up longer for work.

He turned paler, when people asked he smiled and told them that maybe he should go out more.

He got thinner, he laughed and said he’s just forgotten to eat

Now Kaminari and Shinsou can’t talk anymore.

Now Kaminari and Shinsou can’t smile anymore.

Now Kaminari and Shinsou can’t laugh anymore.

Shinsou Hitoshi

Age of death: 25

20?? - 20??

Cause of death: Suicide

Kaminari Denki

Age of death: 27

20?? - 20??

Cause of death: Starvation

blog.name: bnhahc
blog.title: BNHA Headcannons
blog.description:
Hi, I'm Jude (or Coret, if you wanna use my pen name)!
I own this weirdness! If you would like to submit your own headcanons to me, go ahead! I'm always accepting asks, and I love getting them!!

body:
GUYS

Imagine the bakusquad climbing on to the Heights Alliance roof and just… Chilling. Like on warm-but-not-hot days they climb up there after school and hang out. And it’s quieter within them than usual, because all of them are stressed and just wanna get rid of that pre-test headache.

Some nights they make a pallet out of blankets (or even manage to get a few futons up there) and look at the stars. Bakugou always passes out first because of how early he usually goes to sleep. Then goes Kirishima, Ashido, Sero, and then Kaminari passes out near 1 in the morning, half humming to himself, half poking his friends’ cheeks to make them squirm (he accidentally woke up Baku once… Never touched him again).

One time they woke up in the middle of the night because of a heavy rain…

Aizawa doesn’t really have anything against this, because they haven’t done anything bad up there… Yet… Just as long as they don’t fall off the roof.

blog.name: bnhaforthesoul
blog.title: For Your BNHA Needs
blog.description: iysha. 19. I write stuff? (18+) Requests: CLOSED! Be nice to each other little nuggets. Masterpost.

title: Spooky SZN
body:
Warnings: it sucks

A/N: i learned some things while trying to write this… i don’t know the manga characters as well as i thought i did.. and i suck at head canons…

so yeah,, this is really late,, and really short and really lame and i am sorry.

Mr. Compress

  • you know DAMN well this guy LOVES Halloween
  • When you decided you wanted to have a get together for Halloween he turned the whole house into a nightmare
  • There were cobwebs and jump scares literally everywhere. 
  • “The guests HAVE to wear costumes… or else.”
  •  *insert Dracula laugh*

Toya Setsuno

  • He is probably more hyped than you are honestly.
  • Your energies and ideas just feed off of each other so they become never ending. 
  • The two of you once spent a whole week creating the most perfect plan for Halloween day
  • When Halloween day came, the two of you ending up just passing out candy like every other Halloween

Bakugou

  • He pretends to hate it but he secretly loves how passionate you are about the holiday
  • Any time you play classic Halloween songs he will literally throw a hissy fit: “Can you turn that SHIT off!”
  • You bought a clown mask to scare him and hid in the closet till he got home 
  • When he opened the closet he didn’t even notice you
  • And when he did all he said was “hey babe”

blog.name: main-redironrouge
blog.title: I'm just a loser who writes fanfic
blog.description: Welcome to my trash bin of a blog. Eyyyy.

tags: i dont remember what other fandoms i put on here
tags are the bane of my existence
body:
Stuff about Requests

Fandoms I’m really familiar with;

Naruto

Boku No Hero Academia/My Hero Academy

Final Fantasy XV

Dgray Man

Angels of Death

K Project

Psycho Pass

God Eater

Fallout 4 (it’s been a while since I played the other games)

Horizon Zero Dawn

Tales of Berseria

Hakuoki

CollarxMalice

There’s a lot of fandoms I’m decently or slightly informed in. I watch a lot of anime, play a lot of games. So if there’s a fandom not mentioned just send me a message or ask and I’ll let you know if I think I’m informed enough to write it for you!

I think I’m best at one-shots, but I’ve written a few multi-chapter stories on request in the past.

10 Things to Know:

1. I don’t do romantic adult/minor ships, regardless of the status of consent the request gives. This is one of my very rare hard no rules.

2. I don’t write incest because it just makes me personally uncomfortable.

3. I can and will write about trauma from sensitive topics, but I won’t write the actual trauma. (I.e. I will write a request about someone dealing with sexual assault, but I’m not writing a sexual assault scene.)

4. I accept NSFW requests, but I’m not very good at them, because I generally feel out if my element writing it. Allow that to be a risk you take on your own entrusting me with that.

5. If you request something and don’t like the result I give you message me, let me know what you did and didn’t like and give me some ideas of where you’d rather I go with it. We can work it out until you like it.

6. I do accept headcanon and story requests, but personally I believe I’m better suited for one-shot requests.

7. FairyTailCutie used to be my handle on Fanfiction.net and my first Ao3 account (fanfiction.net deleted the account, I believe, though). If you see anything cross posted on my newest account on Ao3 be aware of this before accusing me of stealing other people’s work. I’m slowly working on rewriting my old work from those accounts.

8. I predominantly write F/M relationships. I also feel comfortable writing F/F requests. I will try my hand at M/M, but writing from a perspective of a guy is something I’m not used to so I feel like I’m not good at it. Along with this I write OCs. I know it’s not popular in some fandoms, but it’s what I’m used to.

9. Sometimes requests may come out slow and sometimes they may not. I have children so you can probably imagine setting aside time to write isn’t always an option. I WILL keep in touch and keep you updated on if I have to put a request on hold. I won’t be offended if you decide you don’t want to wait and go to someone else. It’s understandable. Just inform me.

10. I write and read fast. Grammar mistakes happen and no matter how many times I try to proof read there’s always some that slip by. I’m sorry in advance for that.
